description.value: You appear to teleport across the battlefield in short jumps, make attacks, and then teleport again. In truth, you repeatedly pause time as you move from place to place, unpausing time just long enough to make attacks. When you cast this spell, you immediately gain a move action that you can only use to walk, climb, swim, or otherwise move; this move action doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity or trigger special effects caused by moving through an area (such as triggering traps and hazards). After the move action, you can immediately make an attack with a –2 penalty using a weapon that doesn’t have the unwieldy special property, and any creatures you target are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} against your attack. You can repeat this process up to three more times, moving and attacking each time.
